Oranges are a good source of vitamin C, fiber, potassium, and other nutrients that are important for good health. Eating oranges regularly can help reduce the risk of certain diseases, such as heart disease and cancer, and can help improve overall health.

Oranges are a good source of dietary fiber, vitamin C, thiamin, folate, and antioxidants. Eating oranges regularly can help reduce the risk of certain diseases, such as high blood pressure, heart disease, stroke, and cancer.
